title: Analysis from graph of derivative part - d

content.question: At what value of x, for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>7</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>7</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CCA@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, does f attain its absolute maximum? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: At what value of x, for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>7</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>7</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CCA@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, does f attain its absolute maximum? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
